Description: Beautiful, spacious, 3BR/1BA in 3-family house on tree-lined street in Huron Village, Cambridge. Very quiet neighborhood. Easy on-street parking. Bus lines at both corners. Walk to nearby shops and Fresh Pond; bike or walk to Harvard Square. 6 rooms, hardwood floors, eat-in kitchen, dishwasher, pantry, front balcony, spacious rear deck, basement storage and washer/dryer. Groups welcome.
